triples.name: Data management
triples.relevance: Data management is the primary subject area of SIGMOD, encompassing the practices and systems for handling data as a valuable organizational resource.

triples.name: Data science
triples.relevance: Data science is one of the new research categories introduced at SIGMOD 2021, focusing on data-intensive components of data science pipelines.

triples.name: Machine learning
triples.relevance: Machine learning automation is discussed as a key topic in the conference panel on data preparation and data science, reflecting growing interest in automated ML systems.

triples.name: Peer review
triples.relevance: Peer review is the core methodology used for evaluating and selecting papers, with new quality standards and constructive reviewing processes introduced at SIGMOD 2021.
